title: Transition of car-based human-mobility in the pandemic era: Data insight from a cross-border region in Europe
summary: This study explores spatio-temporal transitions in cross-country road traffic volumes to model behavioral transitions in car-based human mobility. It reports on individual car-based daily travel behavior detected before and during the pandemic era, providing data insights from a cross-border region in Europe.
usefulness_reason: The paper explicitly mentions 'spatio-temporal transitions' and 'road traffic data' which aligns with spatio-temporal analysis. The 'data insight' and 'human-mobility' aspects suggest a connection to contextual or survey-like data, although 'point process' is not directly mentioned.
